name: Repair Force
description:
Submission for the Vancouver Global Game Jam 2020

Repair Force is a couch coop game where you and your friends try to keep a giant robot functional as it wreaks havoc on humanity. Play with up to 4 people in this frantic joy ride of destruction. Requires xbox controllers to play.

Game is not complete, but was a great effort within 48 hours.

Steven Kearney - Programming
Cameron Krebbers - Programming
Ralph Bustamante - Programming
Christian Sherden - Animation/Programming
Austin Harry - Modelling/Animation
David Hinds - Modelling/Animation
Kayley Cordoviz - Design
Tania Mogutnova - Design
Kenny Hale - Music/Sound
